title: Counterfeit Blonde Clown White Makeup (Small 3.4 Ounces)
features: Counterfeit Blonde Clown Makeup - The perfect white face paint. Great coverage and easy to Remove.

description: Narwhal Novelties white face pait is mostly made of natural ingredients to make it suitable for long-term use. It is smooth on the skin and easy to apply using a sponge or applicator. It also stays intact for a very long time - a perfect makeup must-have for clowns and mime people that perform indoors and outdoors.
This white coatume makeup is specially-formulated with natural oils to help prevent drying and caking. It includes lanolin, an oil extracted from sheep that hydrates the skin.

Since this is oil-based, it glides smoothly on the skin. This white coatume makeup comes with a creamy consistency to cover the face or any area. It is also buildable so you can go as thin or thick as you want. Can also be layered with other makeup.

This white body paint contains natural compounds. Generally good to use even for kids and sensitive skin. But to be sure, conduct a skin patch test first to see if your skin will react negatively to it.

This white FX face paint is versatile for various applications. Use it as a base face paint for different Halloween characters like vampires, Goths, zombies, skeletons, and evil clowns. This clow makeup is also an excellent make-up for mime performers. Express your creativity and achieve the look you want with professional makeup and face paints. Get your Halloween makeup and white face chalk paint none other than from Narwhal Novelties!
